name: Spin Paladin
description:
*DISCLAIMER* Currently there is no way to win the game. Waves will restart and continue spawning as long as the player is alive. Also if the player gets eliminated there is nothing else to do but close the game.  Thank you so much for giving this a try. 

You play as Atla. An adventuring paladin who controls a magic spinning mace. While on his travels he went into a cave and was captured. Atla is currently under the control of the Boss Council. Help Atla defeat enemies and the Boss Council so they can finally escape. 

HOW TO PLAY

Move the character with WASD. To stop your weapon from spinning click the left mouse button and hold, then a projectile will fire in that direction once you let go of the button. Fire at enemies to eliminate them while trying not to fall over the edge of the platform.

All art and music was originally made for this project.
